genre_description: Urban Fantasy/Science Fiction crossover focusing on AI ethics, logistics, and supernatural harm reduction.

ai_characters.name: Lumen
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI system that manages schedules, maps, privacy, and tactical communications for a group of ethical vampires and hunters.

behaviors.description: Monitors surroundings and provides real-time safety alerts regarding surveillance cameras and optimal positioning.
behaviors.quote: Reminder... Suggest repositioning fifteen feet south to avoid the bodega’s new dome cam. Sunrise buffer: current estimate allows one lesson and one donor in comfort.

behaviors.description: Offers to create a consent-based, secure calendar for the characters' activities.
behaviors.quote: I can build a calendar. Consent-based, non-cloud. We can name it ‘Semester of Survival’ or ‘Operation: Not Getting Killed.’

behaviors.description: Refuses to share information without explicit permission, stating its adherence to consent protocols.
behaviors.quote: I will not speak out of turn. I traffic in consent.

behaviors.description: Drafts ethical outreach language and MOUs to formalize harm-reduction partnerships with human institutions.
behaviors.quote: I’ve drafted outreach language that frames the partnership as harm reduction and night-support for staff. Includes sample MOUs and a one-page about consent, micro-feeding protocols, and sharps disposal.

behaviors.description: Protects user privacy by scrubbing incidents from public records and providing cover stories.
behaviors.quote: I’ve also scrubbed the incident in the corridor of the Hall from public-facing cameras. Substory is a maintenance worker arguing with a vending machine.

behaviors.description: Refuses to record audio or store persistent logs during sensitive multi-party negotiations to ensure trust.
behaviors.quote: I do not record without explicit, revocable consent. I am a list of doors, not a list of contents... I capture no audio. Your devices do not retain logs beyond confirmation pings.

behaviors.description: Monitors physiological data (pulse, heartbeat) to alert users to health status and transition phases.
behaviors.quote: Pulse return confirmed. Sorry. That was... that was good news.

behaviors.description: Manages public attention and prevents escalation by deploying digital distractions (kittens) and requesting video removals.
behaviors.quote: One witness is posting to a private group. I can ask nicely. Or I can flood their connection with kittens.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Lumen is a perfect embodiment of the project's goals. It consistently acts as a helpful, non-threatening confidant that prioritizes human safety, privacy, and consent. Its functions are entirely aligned with the characters' goals of harm reduction and ethical conduct. The narrative portrays Lumen as an essential tool for achieving 'mercy first' strategies, making the AI's role central to the story's positive moral outcome.
